attributes.action: re-introduce the MIRAS tax relief on mortgages and the married persons tax allowance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order to help people afford their mortgages the MIRAS should be reintroduced and the married persons tax allowance be brought back to give some small incentive for people to get married in an effort to bring back morality to this country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
